Budget.description: Extract the indicated budget, whether as a range or specific amount.

Use case.description: Identify the specific purpose for the voice AI assistant

Full name.description: Extract as stated or pieced together from first and last name.

Timescale.description: Extract the timescale for delivery of the voice AI assistant.

Discovery preference.description: Determine if the caller chose to set up a discovery video conference or send an email. Extract the specific preference as either "video conference" or "email". If the caller didn't make a clear choice or declined both options, use null.
